rows.label: qev040801_MSG0001
rows.name: Nngh...nh... Y-you... [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_JNK0010
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev040801_SEL0011
rows.name: Show concern for the collapsed Moimoi.

rows.label: qev040801_JNK0020
rows.name: Assess

rows.label: qev040801_SEL0021
rows.name: Calmly confirm Moimoi's present situation.

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0002
rows.name:
Friend is very kind... For you see...until brotherpon
comes back with Sword of Legendaryness...Moimoi
is broke.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0003
rows.name:
Moimoi...so hungry... Playing dead to...minimize
energy consumption...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0004
rows.name:
Until brotherpon comes back...with Sword of
Legendaryness...Moimoi is broke.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0005
rows.name:
Moimoi...so hungry... Playing dead to...minimize
energy consumption...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0006
rows.name: No need to worry... Only playing dead...for now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0007
rows.name:
But forget about Moimoi... Take this last piece of food
to hungry brotherpon...on his journey. P-please...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0008
rows.name:
Last Moimoi heard...Muimui was in the west part of
Ibra Ravine...in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0009
rows.name:
Muimui said Sword of Legendaryness was in reach...
but he was too hungry to carry on...
So please...bring this last piece of bread...to him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev040801_SEL0031
rows.name: Swear that you will deliver the bread to Muimui.

rows.label: qev040801_JNK0040
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev040801_SEL0041
rows.name: Express concern about Moimoi's health.

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0010
rows.name: You BLADEs are...collection of noble friends...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0011
rows.name: N-no... Worry about brotherpon more than Moimoi...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0012
rows.name:
Nopon...who collapse inside New LA...is napping.
Nopon...who collapse outside New LA...is lunch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0013
rows.name: Please... Save...brotherpon...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0014
rows.name: That slice of bread is...last piece of food we have...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0015
rows.name:
Please...take it to brotherpon...in west part of Ibra
Ravine...in Oblivia...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0016
rows.name: Forget about Moimoi... Just...save brotherpon...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0017
rows.name:
Brotherpon has returned! Muimui even bring home
cosse beans as souvenir![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0018
rows.name:
B-brotherpon... Was the last piece of bread Moimoi
saved for you tasty and succulent? Did it make juices
run down chin?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0019
rows.name:
Moimoi was so hungry, but desire to help brotherpon
was stronger... So Moimoi...resist temptation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0020
rows.name:
Er, it was best thing Muimui ever tasted!
Filled Muimui with energy to make it home safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0021
rows.name:
...Right, BLADE friend? Right? And also those cosse
beans Muimui went so far out of way to pick just
for...brotherpon?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_JNK0050
rows.name: Corroborate

rows.label: qev040801_SEL0051
rows.name: Back up Muimui's lie.

rows.label: qev040801_JNK0060
rows.name: Expose

rows.label: qev040801_SEL0061
rows.name: Reveal Muimui's lie.

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0022
rows.name:
Moimoi have best brotherpon in all Mira!
Muimui amazing even by BLADE standards![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0023
rows.name:
R-really? Well then, next time Muimui DEFINITELY
find Sword of Legendaryness and show everyone
how amazing brotherpon of Moimoi really is![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0024
rows.name:
Moimoi cannot wait! Not long now before brotherpons
both eating like kings![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0025
rows.name:
Oh, and here is reward for friend. Moimoi hopes
BLADE friend will continue helping Muimui in quest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0026
rows.name:
Brotherpon is cruel... Moimoi collapsed from hunger,
but still saved bread...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0027
rows.name: Moimoi not mad. Just...disappointed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0028
rows.name:
Muimui not expect to lose trust of brotherpon this way.
Other ways, sure, but... Well, Muimui swear to find
sword next time. That make up for this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0029
rows.name:
P-please, Brotherpon... Moimoi not last much longer
without decent food.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040801_MSG0030
rows.name:
...Still, Moimoi glad brotherpon safe for now.
So here is shiny reward for BLADE friend.[ST:wait ]
